ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate

Class ProxyAggregator<T,A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.lambdaj.proxy.InvocationInterceptor
      • ch.lambdaj.proxy.ProxyIterator<T>
        • ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate.ProxyAggregator<T,A>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<T>, InvocationHandler, net.sf.cglib.proxy.Callback, net.sf.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor

    public class ProxyAggregator<T,A>
extends ProxyIterator<T>
    Proxies a list of objects in order to seamlessly aggregate their value by exposing the API of a single object.
    Author:
    Mario Fusco
